resources.string: Location permission needed for core functionality
Permission was denied, but is needed for core functionality.

Welcome to the Location in Background Sample.

For this app to show you your location, you will need to approve the app's access to your location.

Please do that below.

To make the Location in Background Sample even better and track our location even when the app isn't open, allow us to access your background location. 

For this app to show you your location, you will need to approve the app's access to your location.

Please do that below.
